bot_resets: After every reset the bot sends Destiny 2 information to registered channels
bot_leader: Make clan member leaderboards for any metric that is available in the game
bot_lfg: Create LFG posts. You can review applications to your groups
bot_locale: The bot supports the same languages as Destiny 2. Translations are crowdsourced
bot_desc: is a multifunctional bot for Destiny 2. It provides info about resets, makes clan leaderboards and helps you to create and manage LFG posts.
index_desc1: The site provides reset info, as the bot
index_desc2: but additionally it gives you Eververse info.
index_ev: Speculations about the weekly Eververse sales for the season
seo_botdesc: Indeedstor is a bot for Destiny 2
seo_evwdescl: Speculations about the weekly Eververse sales for the season
